data.title: Severance
data.desc: Adam Scott stars in this darkly gripping series from director Ben Stiller.

data.title: Lincoln's Dilemma
data.desc: Diverse voices offer a 21st-century take on Lincoln's legacy and stance on slavery.

data.title: The Sky Is Everywhere
data.desc: A conflicted teen navigates first love-and first loss-using her vivid imagination.

data.title: Pretzel and the Puppies
data.desc: Meet a lovable dachshund family ready to 'make their bark' on the world.

data.title: Suspicion
data.desc: Four people embark on a against time after being accused of a kidnapping.

data.title: The Afterparty
data.desc: An all-star cast leads this hilarious mystery about a high school reunion murder.

data.title: Servant
data.desc: The Turners and Leanne return for a new season of shocking twists and turns.

data.title: Fraggle Rock: Back to the Rock
data.desc: Dance, sing, and laugh-the lovable Fraggles are back with all-new adventures.

data.title: The Tragedy of Macbeth
data.desc: A tale of murder, madness, ambition, and wrathful cunning.

data.title: El Deafo
data.desc: After losing her hearing, Cece learns that differences can make you super.

data.title: Swan Song
data.desc: Mahershala Ali grapples with altering his family's fate in a tale of love, loss and sacrifice.
